name: Spinning Top
description:
Spinning top

Be a Spinning Top, you are free to run, jump, fly and kick enemies out of space or destroy they.

Your mission is to collect keys or go all the way to the end of platform, or push the balls to the right color hole.
In final level, you need to destroy all enemies do to win this game.

You can kick rubber enemy by just touch it.
You can destroy the other enemies by tread on the top.
In certain levels, you need to destroy all enemies in order to touch the "key".
Take a good use of the shields in final level.




Instruction
1. WASD --- forward, turn left, back, turn right.
2. Space bar --- jump.
3. Mouse wheel --- forward and backward.
4. Mouse wheel press --- jump.
5. Left mouse button --- turn left.
6. Right mouse button --- turn right.
7. Game joystick --- Left button (up, down, left, right)-forward, backward, turn left, turn right.
8. Game joystick --- left joystick-forward, backward, turn left, turn right.
9. Joystick --- Front (L1 L2 R1 R2)-Jump.
10. Start button or pause button(middle right) --- pause and resume.("Backspace")
11. Selection button or back button(middle left) --- Quit game.
